appSubtitle: Upload your .FIT activity files to explore all the data inside
noHrvDataAvailable: No HRV data available (requires RR intervals).
tooltip_duration: Total elapsed time of the activity, including pauses and stops.
tooltip_distance: Total distance covered during the activity, measured by GPS or sensor.
tooltip_calories: Estimated total energy expenditure, calculated from heart rate, age, weight, and activity type.
tooltip_avgHeartRate: Average heart rate during the activity, measured in beats per minute (bpm).
tooltip_maxHeartRate: Highest heart rate recorded during the activity.
tooltip_minHeartRate: Lowest heart rate recorded during the activity.
tooltip_avgPace: Average pace calculated from speed. Lower values indicate faster movement.
tooltip_avgSpeed: Average speed during moving time, excluding pauses.
tooltip_maxSpeed: Maximum speed recorded during the activity.
tooltip_avgCadence: Average steps/revolutions per minute. For running, this is step rate; for cycling, pedal RPM.
tooltip_maxCadence: Maximum cadence recorded during the activity.
tooltip_avgPower: Average power output measured in watts. Requires a power meter.
tooltip_maxPower: Maximum power output recorded during the activity.
tooltip_normalizedPower: Weighted average power that accounts for variability. Better represents physiological cost.
tooltip_tss: Training Stress Score - quantifies training load based on intensity and duration.
tooltip_intensityFactor: Ratio of Normalized Power to Functional Threshold Power (FTP).
tooltip_elevation: Total vertical distance climbed during the activity.
tooltip_totalAscent: Total elevation gained, measured by barometric altimeter or GPS.
tooltip_totalDescent: Total elevation lost during the activity.
tooltip_avgAltitude: Average altitude above sea level during the activity.
tooltip_respiration: Average breathing rate in breaths per minute, measured by compatible sensors.
tooltip_avgRespirationRate: Average respiration rate during the activity.
tooltip_temperature: Ambient temperature recorded by the device sensor.
tooltip_trainingEffect: Aerobic training effect on a 0-5 scale. Measures impact on cardio fitness.
tooltip_anaerobicEffect: Anaerobic training effect on a 0-5 scale. Measures impact on high-intensity capacity.
tooltip_hrv: Heart Rate Variability - variation in time between heartbeats. Indicates recovery and stress.
tooltip_rmssd: Root Mean Square of Successive Differences. The primary measure of parasympathetic nervous activity (recovery). Higher is generally better.
tooltip_sdnn: Standard Deviation of NN intervals. Reflects total variability (both sympathetic and parasympathetic). Higher generally indicates better fitness.
tooltip_pnn50: Percentage of successive RR intervals differing by >50ms. Another measure of parasympathetic activity.
tooltip_meanNN: Average time between heartbeats in milliseconds.
tooltip_sport: The type of activity (running, cycling, swimming, etc.).
tooltip_subSport: More specific activity type (trail running, mountain biking, etc.).
tooltip_startTime: Timestamp when the activity was started.
tooltip_elapsedTime: Total time from start to finish, including all pauses.
tooltip_movingTime: Time spent actively moving, excluding pauses and stops.
tooltip_laps: Number of lap markers in the activity, auto or manual.
tooltip_records: Total number of data points recorded (typically one per second).
